pullRequest.body:
Splitting it out in https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/21554 was motivated by avoiding imports of ENNReal.
This motivation has become moot now:
- with https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/22562, just the basic properties of ENNReal do not add that many
  further imports
- after https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/21670, Normed/Group/Basic.lean will import ENNReal anyway.

Adding to this, the split into Basic and Continuity was never really clear
in terms of imports: Basic.lean should be split further, but this does not seem
like a good splitting boundary.

While at it, replace one 'open' that has been likely mis-ported by 'open scoped'.

---

- [ ] depends on: #22562
